name: The Struggles Of Stefan
description:
An adventure that takes persistence and passion from not just Stefan (the protagonist), but also the player. Brace yourself, as you are guided by Stefan's conscience to confront enemies, take countless leaps, and engage in progression of a story-line regarding acceptance of oneself.



  • A 2.5-dimensional platformer with a plot of accepting life-choices, and their potential ramifications.
  • Acquire particular items to accomplish each level quicker & easier.
  • Basic controller mechanics.
  • Multiple chapters consisting of numerous themes.
